#######
####### CANCER ANALYSES:
#######


############################### Body/1Raw:
##### ../../Body/1Raw/DEG_GlycOxph_ALL.zip 
# file is generated by Kristina. 
# based on suppl table 7 of the paper "Pan-cancer analysis of transcriptional metabolic dysregulation using The Cancer Genome Atlas" Nat Comm 2018

############################### Head/2Scripts
# PURPOSE		: To derive markers of glycolysis based of fold changes 
# AUTHOR, DATE	: Kostya
# SCRIPT		: Head/2Scripts/Cancer.DeriveLevelOfGlycolysisForEachCancerType.R
# INPUT FILE 	: ../../Body/1Raw/DEG_GlycOxph_ALL.zip
# OUTPUT FILE   : ../../Body/2Derived/Cancer.DeriveLevelOfGlycolysisForEachCancerType.txt

############################### Head/2Scripts
# PURPOSE		: To find differences in mut spec between different cancer types
# AUTHOR, DATE	: Kostya
# SCRIPT		: Head/2Scripts/Cancer.DifferencesBetweenCancerTypes.R
# INPUT FILE 	: ../../Body/2Derived/mtDNA_snv_Oct2016.PatientInfo.txt + ../../Body/2Derived/Cancer.DeriveLevelOfGlycolysisForEachCancerType.txt
# OUTPUT FILE   : ../../Body/4Figures/Cancer.DifferencesBetweenCancerTypes.01.pdf



#######
####### WHOLE-GENOME ANALYSES:
#######

###############################
# PURPOSE		: To check correct translation of nucleotides to aminoacids; to trim overlapped regions; print out trimmed AmioAcids and Codons; 
# PURPOSE		: To count codon usage for the trimmed codons (64 columns); derive A T G C numbers in their synonymous fourfold sites; 
# PURPOSE		: To add Class and Full taxonomy; print out only chordata species with 13 well translated prot cod genes (N = 3453)
# AUTHOR, DATE	: Kostya, 26 Nov 2018  
# SCRIPT		: Head/2Scripts/WholeGenomeAnalysesCodonUsageNoOverlap.R
# INPUT FILE 1	: ../../Body/2Derived/AllGenesCodons.zip 		 			# aminoacids and nucleotides (Alina's python script), work only with genes with quality = 1 (translation is correct)
# INPUT FILE 2	: ../../Body/2Derived/cds_coords.csv             			# coordinates of all prot cod genes (Kristina's python script), work only with species where exactly 13 prot cod genes are annotated.  
# INPUT FILE 3 	: ../../Body/2Derived/full_table.zip     		 			# source of taxonomy
# OUTPUT FILE   : ../../Body/3Results/AllGenesCodonUsageNoOverlap.txt.zip 	# species / gene / start/ end / overlaps / class / whole taxonomy / 64 codon usage / A T G C frequencies in synonymous fourfold sites / 
Species	Gene	GeneStart	GeneEnd	CodonsToDeleteInTheBeginning	CodonsToDeleteAtTheEnd	AminoNoOverlap	CodonsNoOverlap	AAA	AAC	AAG	AAT	ACA	ACC	ACG	ACT	AGA	AGC	AGG	AGT	ATA	ATC	ATG	ATT	CAA	CAC	CAG	CAT	CCA	CCC	CCG	CCT	CGA	CGC	CGG	CGT	CTA	CTC	CTG	CTT	GAA	GAC	GAG	GAT	GCA	GCC	GCG	GCT	GGA	GGC	GGG	GGT	GTA	GTC	GTG	GTT	TAA	TAC	TAG	TAT	TCA	TCC	TCG	TCT	TGA	TGC	TGG	TGT	TTA	TTC	TTG	TTT	NeutralA	NeutralT	NeutralG	NeutralC	Taxonomy	Class

###############################
# PURPOSE		: To draw A T G C fractions in neutral sites along mtDNA for different species
# AUTHOR, DATE	: Kostya, 26 Nov 2018  
# SCRIPT		: Head/2Scripts/WholeGenomeAnalyses.AtgcAlongGenomes.R
# INPUT FILE 	: ../../Body/3Results/AllGenesCodonUsage.txt
# OUTPUT FILE   : ../../Body/4Figures/WholeGenomeAnalyses.AtgcAlongGenomes.R.01.pdf

###############################
# PURPOSE		: To draw A T G C fractions between taxa
# AUTHOR, DATE	: Kostya, 26 Nov 2018  
# SCRIPT		: Head/2Scripts/WholeGenomeAnalyses.AtgcBetweenTaxa.R
# INPUT FILE 	: ../../Body/3Results/AllGenesCodonUsage.txt
# OUTPUT FILE   : ../../Body/4Figures/WholeGenomeAnalyses.AtgcBetweenTaxa.R.01.pdf

###############################
# PURPOSE		: Fraction of nucleotides versus generation time of mammals
# AUTHOR, DATE	: Kostya, 26 Nov 2018  
# SCRIPT		: Head/2Scripts/WholeGenomeAnalyses.MutagensWithinMammals.R
# INPUT FILE 	: ../../Body/3Results/AllGenesCodonUsage.txt
# INPUT FILE 	: ../../Body/1Raw/GenerationLenghtforMammals.xlsx.txt
# OUTPUT FILE   : ../../Body/4Figures/WholeGenomeAnalyses.MutagensWithinMammals.R.01.pdf

###############################
# PURPOSE		: Fraction of nucleotides versus ecology (GT = female maturity days, MLS) of chordata
# AUTHOR, DATE	: Kostya, 26 Nov 2018  
# SCRIPT		: Head/2Scripts/WholeGenomeAnalyses.EcologyAndMutSpecChordata.R
# INPUT FILE 	: ../../Body/3Results/AllGenesCodonUsage.txt
# INPUT FILE 	: ../../Body/1Raw/anage_data.txt
# OUTPUT FILE   : ../../Body/4Figures/WholeGenomeAnalyses.EcologyAndMutSpecChordata.R.01.pdf

###############################
# PURPOSE		: Coefficient of variation in A T G C along genome of all chordata classes
# AUTHOR, DATE	: Kostya, 26 Nov 2018  
# SCRIPT		: Head/2Scripts/WholeGenomeAnalyses.AtgcCoeffVarTaxaGenes.R
# INPUT FILE 	: ../../Body/3Results/AllGenesCodonUsage.txt
# OUTPUT FILE   : ../../Body/4Figures/WholeGenomeAnalyses.AtgcCoeffVarTaxaGenes.R.01.pdf

###############################
# PURPOSE		: To polarise branches reconstructed by PIPELINE making ancestal-descendant pairs
# AUTHOR, DATE	: Alya, 15 Nov 2017 (modified May 2018) 
# SCRIPT		: Head/2Scripts/1MTspec_ALYA_polarise_branches_with_seq.R
# INPUT FILE 	: ../../Body/1Raw/pipeline_trees/.. (3 types of files:SPECIESNAME.GENE.tree.matrix;SPECIESNAME.GENE.ancestors.fa;SPECIESNAME.GENE.terminals.nuc.fa)
# OUTPUT FILE   : ../../Body/2Derived/POLARIZEDBR_DATA/SPECIESNAME.GENE.POLARISED.txt (a lot of files)

###############################
# PURPOSE		: To find substitutions between ancestal-descendant pairs and extract them into table
# AUTHOR, DATE	: Alya, 18 Nov 2017 (modified May 2018) 
# SCRIPT		: Head/2Scripts/2MTspec_ALYA_codons_sub.R
# INPUT FILE 	: ../../Body/2Derived/POLARIZEDBR_DATA/SPECIESNAME.GENE.POLARISED.txt (a lot of files)
# OUTPUT FILE   : ../../Body/2Derived/TOTAL_SUBS_ML/SPECIESNAME.GENE.ANCESTRALSEQUENCENAME.DESCENDANTSEQUENCENAME.SUBS.txt (a lot of files)

###############################
# PURPOSE		: To create pre-final table
# AUTHOR, DATE	: Alya, 20 Nov 2017 (modified May 2018) 
# SCRIPT		: Head/2Scripts/3MTspec_ALYA_create_table.R
# INPUT FILE 	: ../../Body/2Derived/TOTAL_SUBS_ML/SPECIESNAME.GENE.ANCESTRALSEQUENCENAME.DESCENDANTSEQUENCENAME.SUBS.txt (a lot of files)
# OUTPUT FILE   : ../../Body/2Derived/1.txt

###############################
# PURPOSE		: To filter pre-final table deleting more than one subs in one codone
# AUTHOR, DATE	: Alya, 20 Nov 2017 (modified May 2018) 
# SCRIPT		: Head/2Scripts/4MTspec_ALYA_fix_table.R
# INPUT FILE 	: ../../Body/2Derived/1.txt
# OUTPUT FILE   : ../../Body/3Results/Mutational_spectra_in_Chordata.txt
